title: MD
biography: Undekhi is an Indian Hindi-language crime thriller web television series which premiered on SonyLIV on 10 July 2020. It is produced by Applause Entertainment and Edgestorm Ventures. The series depicts the two aspects of the society - the power-drunk influential people who think they can get away with anything and the oppressed, subjected to years of torture, who finally decide to bring themselves to justice.
aiSummary: Sunil Dogra is a autoimmune skin disorders specialist with an H-index of 110 at Dermatology (Faculty). Has been published in Journal of clinical neuroscience : official journal of the Neurosurgical Society of Australasia. Based in India.
